originalBookmark.title: Pete Goss. Sailor, adventurer, international speaker. What next? Find out here

metadata.title: Pete Goss. Sailor, adventurer, international speaker. What next? Find out here
metadata.description: Pete Goss.  What will he do next?  Ocean Sailing, Sea-Kayaking, Polar Exploration? With numerous adventures and build projects behind him, will he organise a trip to the North Pole, decide to do something amazing with under privileged children, inspire us with his motivational talks and speeches or just sit back and have a cup of tea?  Find out here.
